About.paragraph: As more kids start using the internet, sexual harrasment rates have skyrocketed for minors. Every nine minutes, one child is sexually abused. Chatguard is a free service that helps fight sexual harrasment and pedophiles. With just an upload, we intend on eliminating that number. Chatguard is a safespace for all kids. Our goal is to make a change in our community

Features.title: Upload
Features.text: Upload any creepy or uncomfortable messages and we will determine if you are being harrased by a pedophile.

Features.title: Form
Features.text: Fill out a survery on your situation and our website will determine the severity of your situation.

Features.title: Create A Profile
Features.text: You can list any pedophiles or creepy people that you have noticed for others to watch out for.

Features.title: Get Help
Features.text: Find a list of resources that can support you if you need urgent help. Find therapy centers near you.
